Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.22465300]Japanese encephalitis virus(JEV):inhibition of viral replication in BHK-21 cells(IC50=10 ± 1.4 μM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: [Ref.22465300]Did not stimulate significant cytotoxicity in BHK-21 cells even at 200 μM.
Sequence Information.Mechanism of action: prevent JEV infection by interfering in virus attachment to the cells.

Literature.Title: Inhibition of Japanese encephalitis virus entry into the cells by the envelope glycoprotein domain III (EDIII) and the loop3 peptide derived from EDIII.
Literature.Author: Li C, Zhang LY, Sun MX, Li PP, Huang L, Wei JC, Yao YL, Isahg H, Chen PY, Mao X.
